Package org.fluentjava.collections

Package with extended collections.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Enumerable<E> Implements a enumeration protocol.
FluentList<E> List that has type safe toArray, and has a fluent interface on methods.
FluentMap<K,V> Map that has a fluent interface on methods.
FluentSet<E> Set that has type safe toArray, and has a fluent interface on methods.
 

Class Summary
CheckedComparableComparator<T extends Comparable<? super T>> Simple comparator that takes any type that is comparable and compares using its natural order.
ComparableComparator<T> Comparator that takes any type that is comparable, and uses its natural order.
Dictionary<K,V> Standard Implementation of Fluent map.
Enumerator<E> Class that takes an iterable, and implements all Enumerable methods using only its iterator.
ExtendedSet<E> Standard implementation of FluentSet.
Pair<F,S> Simple Pair of types F and S.
Sequence<E> Standard implementation of FluentList.
 

Exception Summary
EnumeratingException Exception caused when iterating over a collection through the extended collection methods, such as find, exists, collect.
 

Package org.fluentjava.collections Description

Package with extended collections.
